'''Dusk Bird''' is a [[Furnishing]] and [[Wildlife]].

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|1}}

==Locations==
Can be found south of [[Apam Woods]] and northwest of [[Devantaka Mountain]].
<gallery>
Wildlife Dusk Bird Location 1.png
Wildlife Dusk Bird Location 2.png
</gallery>

==Trivia==
* Dusk Birds chirp in {{w|Morse code}}, with short chirps representing "dots" and longer trills representing "dashes."{{table|class=wikitable
|! Morse Code |! Translation
|-
|{{A|VO Dusk Bird - AYUS.ogg}} · – / – · – – / · · – / · · ·
|AYUS
|-
|{{A|VO Dusk Bird - DAWON.ogg}} – · · / · – / · – – / – – – / – ·
|DAWON
|-
|{{A|VO Dusk Bird - DESHRET.ogg}} – · · / · / · · · / · · · · / · – · / · / -
|DESHRET
|-
|{{A|VO Dusk Bird - MIHOYO.ogg}} – – / · · / · · · · / – – – / – · – – / – – –
|MIHOYO
|-
|{{A|VO Dusk Bird - SARVA.ogg}} · · · / · – / · – · / · · · – / · –
|SARVA
}}
* Dusk Birds seem to be a mix between chameleons and parrots, being able to camouflage themselves as well as mimicking human speech. Its physical appearance resembles both animals.
